So many ads that it made me mad. Koya is awesome, but I'm going back to her other videos because I got interrupted 5 times (like some others said).

For those worried about ads. A trick I use is 1) turn off the autoplay 2) fast forward the video until it's about 1 minute left. Let the video play out until the end and then replay.

When I do this I get no ads during my videos. Hopefully it works for you.
